bibl.bibl: Cohn, Ferdinand Julius. 1875a. Ueber die Function der Blasen von Aldrovanda und Utricularia. Beiträge zur Biologie der Pflanzen 1 (1870–5) 3d pt: 71–92.
bibl.idno: BHL and DAR 58.2: 35–43. DAR copy annotated; does not include illustrations. It is a galley proof that Cohn sent with hand-drawn sketches, which CD then sent back to him to show which ones he wanted for Insectivorous plants. Pagination is slightly different to published version. See letter from Cohn, 4 Oct 1874, and letter to Cohn, 1 Jan 1875). SE.
